plurals.name: show_dev_countdown
plurals.item: You are now %d steps away from being a developer.
You are now 1 step away from being a developer.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lowercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d uppercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numbers.
Password must contain at least 1 number.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numbers or symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 number or symbol.

plurals.name: manage_notification_access_summary_nonzero
plurals.item: %d applications can read notifications.
%d application is allowed to read notifications.

1 application installed that provides conditions for this function
